Class AdjacencyDetector

java.lang.Object
DetectAdjacentProperties.AdjacencyDetector
@Layer(BACK_END) public class AdjacencyDetector extends Object
The AdjacencyDetector class is responsible for detecting adjacent properties based on their polygon coordinates. It provides methods to convert CSV data into PropertyPolygon objects and to find adjacent properties.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static List<PropertyPolygon>
    convertToProperties(List<String[]> data)
    Converts a list of CSV data rows into a list of PropertyPolygon objects.
    static List<AdjacentPropertyPair>
    findAdjacentProperties(List<PropertyPolygon> properties)
    Finds adjacent properties by checking if two properties share at least one vertex.
    static List<AdjacentPropertyPair>
    findValidAdjacentPairs(List<PropertyPolygon> properties)
    Finds valid adjacent property pairs by checking if two properties share at least one vertex and belong to different owners.

  • Method Details

    • convertToProperties

      @CyclomaticComplexity(6) public static List<PropertyPolygon> convertToProperties(List<String[]> data)
      Converts a list of CSV data rows into a list of PropertyPolygon objects. It skips rows with polygons that have no vertices. x
      Parameters:
      data - A list of CSV rows, each representing a property with polygon data.
      Returns:
      A list of PropertyPolygon objects.

    • findAdjacentProperties

      @CyclomaticComplexity(8) public static List<AdjacentPropertyPair> findAdjacentProperties(List<PropertyPolygon> properties)
      Finds adjacent properties by checking if two properties share at least one vertex. It returns a list of unique pairs of adjacent properties.
      Parameters:
      properties - A list of PropertyPolygon objects to check for adjacency.
      Returns:
      A list of AdjacentPropertyPair objects, representing pairs of adjacent properties.

    • findValidAdjacentPairs

      @CyclomaticComplexity(11) public static List<AdjacentPropertyPair> findValidAdjacentPairs(List<PropertyPolygon> properties)
      Finds valid adjacent property pairs by checking if two properties share at least one vertex and belong to different owners.
      Parameters:
      properties - A list of PropertyPolygon objects to check for adjacency.
      Returns:
      A list of AdjacentPropertyPair objects, representing pairs of adjacent properties.
